title: Medicine for the 99 percent
description: Sad but true: Many of the cures and vaccines our world desperately needs -- for illnesses millions of people have -- just aren't being produced or developed, because there's no financial incentive. Thomas Pogge proposes a $6 billion plan to revolutionize the way medications are developed and sold.
author: Thomas Pogge
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, economics, global issues, health
